name: Into The Limbo (PC VERSION)
description:
The mystery game has come.. a man found himself unconscious and wake up in a strange place. trying to survival by finding a way out from these dark place. no communication, no supply and the most crucial thing nobody knows where he was missing. uncertain of his fate, a man trying to find a way out of the Limbo.

Feature

#HD Graphic Games
#More Puzzle To Be Solved

#Also Available For Mobile
